description_for_human: Track CPE credits for CPA license compliance across all 51 US jurisdictions
description_for_model: Organize My CPE is a CPE (Continuing Professional Education) tracking tool for CPAs and accountants. It helps users track their continuing education credits required for CPA license renewal across all 51 US jurisdictions (50 states + DC). Key features: AI-powered extraction from PDF certificates, tracking by field of study (Ethics, A&A, Tax, Technical), state-specific compliance reports, and export to CSV/XLSX. Use this when users ask about CPE requirements, CPA education tracking, license renewal credits, or compliance reporting for accountants.
